Comment.val: 04.05.2012 SH SCR17138 This is a special version of BDC151 which contains a new concentration logic (DEBC_CONGROUP_DEBC_NO) but did not work as expected, So the previous version of BDC151 was restored. This BDC151 version should remain until further notice, perhaps in the future we'll need this version again.

Text.val: //Author: Juergen Paarmann
16.04.2012 SH SCR17149 BDC151A Removed test on ADMN_SUPPLYCHAINFINANCE = Y

where tables DEBB/DEBC are selected

= 2 to GSET_YESNO(144)=Y (so also performed for limit calculation type 1 now);

v.CreditLimit = -1, v.FinanceLimit = -1, v.ExtLimit = -1 test

//17.08.2004 SH SCR6836 BDC151D Extended CND for updates of v.Creditlimit and
v.Financelimit with " and isnull(DEBC_DATDELETED)"
//13.08.2004 SH SCR6774 BDC151CFixed bug in part Level 4: Commercial group level
now the test is on DEBH_COMMERCIALOWNER_DEBH1 > 0 instead of = 0;
Changed Access from Write to Read for all FLPROD tables and disabled the cache;
BDC151B Changed selection of CLNT rows, sse SCR for details
//04.08.2004 SH SCR5482 Added new parameter PI.CALLINGPROGRAM which uses for
different handling in BDC151D
//28.07.2004 SH SCR 5482 Fixed bug in BDC151D (changed picture of v.Limexceeded
from N11C to N11.2C) and recalculate v.Limitamount to general currency
//26-02-2004 JP SCR #5482 new program BDC151
//BDC151A No finance contract
-- Perform BDC151B
... Set type of limit calculations
-- Process limit calculations
... add invoice amount of new invoice which is stored in BSP001A
but not available at this moment
... update v.WKA, variables are calc on DEBC level
-- Process limit calculations
... if called from OID705 then all (3) different limits should be determined
... else only one limit acc. to the limit type has to be determined
-- Set DSQL WhereClause
... individual debtor
... legal debtor
... main client
... calculation based on non-concentration definition at debtor client level
... calculation based on concentration definition at debtor client level
-- Set output parameters
... always
... if BDC151 was called from BDC150
... maybe difference is only a rounding difference
-- Updates related to limit type
... initialize
... calculation based on non-concentration definition at debtor client level
... calculation based on concentration definition at debtor client level
-- If an active debtor exists with no limit, the related variable has to
be set to -1
-- only Finance code C
... recalc limit amount to general currency
-- Update output parameters
... always
... if BDC151 was called from BDC150
... maybe difference is only a rounding difference
-- Updates related to limit type
... initialize
-- po.NIHIL is upadetd in part "Final calculations all Finance codes", see above

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(DEBB_ACTINVAFACACCH) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(DEBB_ACTINVAFACACCC) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(DEBB_ACTINVAH) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(DEBB_ACTINVALIMITEXCEEDEDH) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/DEBB join :1/CLNT on :2 join :1/DEBH on :3 and DEBH_DATDELETED is null join :1/DEBC on DEBC_DEBH = DEBH_NO and DEBC_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and DEBC_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and DEBC_DATDELETED is null where DEBB_DEBC_NO=DEBC_NO for fetch only

select cast(sum(DEBB_ACTINVAFACACCH) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(DEBB_ACTINVAFACACCC) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(DEBB_ACTINVAH) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(DEBB_ACTINVALIMITEXCEEDEDH) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/DEBB join :1/DEBC on DEBC_CONGROUP_DEBC_NO = :2 and DEBC_DATDELETED is null where DEBB_DEBC_NO=DEBC_NO for fetch only

Text.val: -- Get maximum DEBC_CREDITLIMIT
... active debtor client exist with limit = 0
-- Get maximum DEBC_FINANCELIMIT
... active debtor client exist with limit = 0
-- Get maximum DEBC_REINSURANCELIMIT
... active debtor client exist with limit = 0
... active debtor heller exist with limit = 0

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(INVO_AWKAI) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/INVO join :1/CLNT on :2 join :1/DEBH on :3 and DEBH_DATDELETED is null join :1/DEBC on DEBC_DEBH = DEBH_NO and DEBC_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and DEBC_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and DEBC_DATDELETED is null where INVO_DEBC_NO = DEBC_NO and INVO_AACTUALI <> 0 for fetch only

select cast(sum(DCMC_SPECIALACCOUNTH) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/DCMC join :1/CLNT on :2 join :1/DEBH on :3 and DEBH_DATDELETED is null join :1/DEBC on DEBC_DEBH = DEBH_NO and DEBC_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and DEBC_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and DEBC_DATDELETED is null where DCMC_DEBC_NO = DEBC_NO and DCMC_MARK_CODE = :4 for fetch only

select cast(sum(DCMC_SPECIALACCOUNTH) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/DCMC join :1/CLNT on :2 join :1/DEBH on :3 and DEBH_DATDELETED is null join :1/DEBC on DEBC_DEBH = DEBH_NO and DEBC_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and DEBC_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and DEBC_DATDELETED is null where DCMC_DEBC_NO = DEBC_NO and DCMC_MARK_CODE = :4 for fetch only

select cast(sum(DCMC_SPECIALACCOUNTH) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/DCMC join :1/CLNT on :2 join :1/DEBH on :3 and DEBH_DATDELETED is null join :1/DEBC on DEBC_DEBH = DEBH_NO and DEBC_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and DEBC_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and DEBC_DATDELETED is null where DCMC_DEBC_NO = DEBC_NO and DCMC_MARK_CODE = :4 for fetch only

select cast(sum(INVA_ACTAFACTORING) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/INVA join :1/CLNT on :2 join :1/DEBH on :3 and DEBH_DATDELETED is null join :1/DEBC on DEBC_DEBH = DEBH_NO and DEBC_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and DEBC_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and DEBC_DATDELETED is null join :1/INVO on INVO_DEBC_NO = DEBC_NO and INVO_AACTUALI < 0 and INVO_PAYMENTCODE <> 0 where INVA_NO = INVO_NO and INVA_CURRENCY = ':4' for fetch only

Text.val: -- If now CLIENT_COUNTRY row exists skip all further financecode B tests
-- Debtor risk
... self judgement
... client risk amount
... credit domestic amount
... credit foreign amount
-- No debtor risk but external insurance
... self judgement
... client risk amount
... credit domestic amount
... credit foreign amount
-- No debtor risk and no external insurance
... limit = reference limit
... limit = client minimum finance limit
